sentence.Network_en: It is one of the five books of the Old Testament that make up the Pentateuch.
sentence.Network_cn: 此卷是《旧约》的五书之一,它们构成“摩西五经”.

PerfectNetExp.abs: pentate 乙琥红霉素, pentateuch 摩西五经, pentateuch 摩西五书
创世记是摩西五经中的第一本。摩西五经(Pentateuch)一词源于希腊语:“penta”是“五”的意思,而“teuchos”则是“工具、容器、书”[2],合起来就是“五卷”或.
pentateuch 摩西五书, pentateuch 首五卷, pentateuch 摩西五经

means.word_mean: 1. the first of three divisions of the Hebrew Scriptures comprising the first five books of the Hebrew Bible considered as a unit

auth_sentence.content: These books were later called the 'Pentateuch', and tradition attributed them to Moses.
auth_sentence.res_content: These books were later called the 'Pentateuch', and tradition attributed them to Moses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These books were later called the 'Pentateuch', and tradition attributed them to Moses.

auth_sentence.content: When I read the Pentateuch, I plainly see that the word God means a race of Gods.
auth_sentence.res_content: When I read the Pentateuch, I plainly see that the word God means a race of Gods.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When I read the Pentateuch, I plainly see that the word God means a race of Gods.
